meanings.definition: Practical contact with and observation of facts or events.
meanings.sent1: My experience at the zoo taught me a lot about animals.
meanings.sent2: She gained valuable experience working at the hospital.
meanings.sent3: It was quite the experience trying to cook dinner for the first time.
meanings.sent4: His experience in the mountains was like a journey into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride was an exhilarating experience.

meanings.definition: Knowledge or skill that comes from having done certain things.
meanings.sent1: His experience in woodworking showed in the beautifully crafted table.
meanings.sent2: She has years of experience in customer service.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fix the car without any experience was a disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her experience in gardening bloomed into a successful business.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut's experience in space was truly out of this world.
